categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: A Case of Mistaken Identities is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. The adventure sends Rebel players to the Both system, where they inadvertently become embroiled in a conflict between warring crime lords on the planet Bothawui. A Case of Mistaken Identities serves as a prelude to two sequel adventures involving the Rebel players, An Invitation to Defect and A Most Deadly Hunt.
